scnd_lang.Engilsh9:
High Quality: caches images and enables animations. + 
Low Quality: Streams images, disables animations, + 
uses less memory. May cause graphical corruption. + 
Use low quality if the game hangs while loading

scnd_lang.Engilsh134: Raila - a fighter specialized in celestia combat
scnd_lang.Engilsh135: Subiya - a fighter specialized in melee combat
scnd_lang.Engilsh136: Lynx - a fighter specialized in dual blade combat
scnd_lang.Engilsh137: Aisha - a fighter specialized in sword combat
scnd_lang.Engilsh138: Ravage - a fighter specialized in brute force via the Earth element
scnd_lang.Engilsh139: Ade - a fighter utilizing the air element
scnd_lang.Engilsh140: Jonah - a fighter specialized in Force combat
scnd_lang.Engilsh141: Adam - a Celestia Being specialized in celestia combat
scnd_lang.Engilsh142: NOVA Adam - an awakened Celestia Being specialized in celestia combat
scnd_lang.Engilsh143: Azaria - Specialized in general combat and the water element
scnd_lang.Engilsh144: Sorrowe - Specialized in celestia combat and the flame element
scnd_lang.Engilsh166: Please wait while your opponent selects a stage
scnd_lang.Engilsh168: your partner has to enter you're name to fight you
scnd_lang.Engilsh169: Press 'M' to pass time on a world map
scnd_lang.Engilsh174: It's been two weeks since the killings began
scnd_lang.Engilsh175: At first the authorities thought a serial killer was behind it
scnd_lang.Engilsh176: But the state of the bodies and the number of casualties said otherwise
scnd_lang.Engilsh179: I'm impressed. You were able to track me.
scnd_lang.Engilsh372: However, you're not taking me anywhere
scnd_lang.Engilsh183: Shortly after picking up his cousin
scnd_lang.Engilsh184: His home was attacked and wrecked by a member of a cult
scnd_lang.Engilsh185: His cousin, Raila, and his friend, Subiya, were badly hurt
scnd_lang.Engilsh186: After they recovered, he decided it would be best to train them in order for them to defend themselves
scnd_lang.Engilsh187: They retired to a secluded location to train, away from the ensuing chaos
scnd_lang.Engilsh192: To what do I owe this pleasure?
scnd_lang.Engilsh193: The Royal Court, has decided to go after the criminals
scnd_lang.Engilsh195: Yes, we'd need as many able bodied Saints as possible, care to join the cause?
scnd_lang.Engilsh198: Yeah, we aren't babies we can take care of ourselves. The Kingdom needs you more than we do
scnd_lang.Engilsh199: Lynx, proceeded to return to Acacia. Leaving his two students to train in his absence.
scnd_lang.Engilsh202: Yo, not so fast. We gotta make sure you're fit for duty
scnd_lang.Engilsh207: Looks like its just you and me huh
scnd_lang.Engilsh208: I think we should head back to the mainland?
scnd_lang.Engilsh210: Hiding out on this island doesn't feel right, we should be out there
scnd_lang.Engilsh211: In case you hadn't noticed, we haven't even passed the physical exam
scnd_lang.Engilsh212: And we totally got wrecked by that psycho dude
scnd_lang.Engilsh213: We aren't trained Saints, rushing to battle in this state -
scnd_lang.Engilsh216: I think you've underestimated our growth
scnd_lang.Engilsh217: Come, I'll show you how far we've grown.
scnd_lang.Engilsh219: An argument breaks out between two allies
scnd_lang.Engilsh220: Listen, I'll be the one leading the assault tomorrow
scnd_lang.Engilsh223: This is lame, how come I never get to be in charge?
scnd_lang.Engilsh224: because you are immature, childish, reckless, stupid
scnd_lang.Engilsh226: Indeed, I don't even know why we kept you to begin with
scnd_lang.Engilsh228: I've had enough of this. You punk!!!
scnd_lang.Engilsh229: Lets see if you can back up your talk
scnd_lang.Engilsh234: Shut up Rav. You're being childish
scnd_lang.Engilsh236: Adam? When did you get here???
scnd_lang.Engilsh239: Indeed, I hope you've made some progress
scnd_lang.Engilsh242: We've gathered enough souls to power the device
scnd_lang.Engilsh244: We've also been training like crazy, they wont stand a chance against all 5 of us
scnd_lang.Engilsh245: Of course, I can beat you down to prove it
scnd_lang.Engilsh246: Um thatâ€™s not a good idea
scnd_lang.Engilsh247: Actually, it is. I'm in the mood for a sparring match. Come with all youve got
scnd_lang.Engilsh248: I'll put in half the effort
scnd_lang.Engilsh252: Adam and his men stormed the Academy
scnd_lang.Engilsh253: The lower rank Saints were no match for them
scnd_lang.Engilsh254: During the ensuing chaos. Two fates, crossed paths yet again
scnd_lang.Engilsh255: So you're back, how long has it been
scnd_lang.Engilsh258: Don't play dumb! You know what I want
scnd_lang.Engilsh260: The council will never allow that
scnd_lang.Engilsh263: Maaaaaaan, looks like were missing an epic party
scnd_lang.Engilsh265: Well, what do we have here?
scnd_lang.Engilsh268: Rai, get out of here, I'll handle this guy
scnd_lang.Engilsh272: Whatever, I still got what I want
scnd_lang.Engilsh274: Hmph, you're too weak to stop me now
scnd_lang.Engilsh278: Shut up, I'll end this once and for all
scnd_lang.Engilsh281: Raila? What are you doing here?
scnd_lang.Engilsh282: Duh, I'm here to help. You look injured
scnd_lang.Engilsh284: Yeah right, I can see Lynx is busy with the ring leader.
scnd_lang.Engilsh285: I'll try and stop his henchmen
scnd_lang.Engilsh288: Our plans are getting messed up
scnd_lang.Engilsh291: As you can tell, this silly game is over.
scnd_lang.Engilsh293: Shut up boy! You're a fool to think you can stop me
scnd_lang.Engilsh296: I stopped the girl, but that punk is getting away
scnd_lang.Engilsh298: Shut up, its a draw dammit
scnd_lang.Engilsh306: Ha ha ha! You have a death wish, boy??
scnd_lang.Engilsh321: This will teach you how to play..... obviously.
scnd_lang.Engilsh323: This, my friends, is your characterEnum Heath Bar.
scnd_lang.Engilsh324: It displays your characterEnum Health Points (HP) as both digits and a percentage.
scnd_lang.Engilsh325: Once your HP goes below zero, or is less than your opponents at the end of a match....
scnd_lang.Engilsh327: Same principle applies to your opponent.
scnd_lang.Engilsh328: Next, your Command Menu (CM), which houses your Move-set.
scnd_lang.Engilsh329: All your characterEnum moves are shown in the Command Menu.
scnd_lang.Engilsh330: Moves are split into 3 categories: Physical, Celestia and Items.
scnd_lang.Engilsh331: Physical moves rely on raw brute force to inflict damage.
scnd_lang.Engilsh332: Celestia moves use Celestia Powers to enhance attacks or activate special abilities.
scnd_lang.Engilsh333: And Items, tend to augment your character or sabotage your opponent.
scnd_lang.Engilsh334: You can navigate through these sections using RIGHT/LEFT, A/D or Scroll Up/Down.
scnd_lang.Engilsh335: All you have to do is select a a single move to Que it up.
scnd_lang.Engilsh337: The Activity Bar (AB) is directly linked to your Command Menu (CM).
scnd_lang.Engilsh338: It fills up over time and automatically governs your Turn.
scnd_lang.Engilsh339: You cant do anything unless your AB is fully charged.
scnd_lang.Engilsh340: As you can see, your CM is disabled while your AB is not fully charged.
scnd_lang.Engilsh341: When your AB is fully activated, your CM is enabled, magic!!!
scnd_lang.Engilsh342: You can now proceed to Que up attacks.
scnd_lang.Engilsh344: This is the Time Counter, here set to infinite
scnd_lang.Engilsh345: Some rounds have a time limit, and you will see the countdown here.
scnd_lang.Engilsh346: And now for the fun part!
scnd_lang.Engilsh347: As you can see, you initially have 4 empty slots.
scnd_lang.Engilsh348: You can select any move from any section.
scnd_lang.Engilsh349: And your slots will fill up.
scnd_lang.Engilsh350: Once all four have filled up, your attacks will be executed in sequence.
scnd_lang.Engilsh367: After execution, your slots will become free yet again
scnd_lang.Engilsh351: The same applies to your opponent.
scnd_lang.Engilsh353: It fills up as both characterEnum attack.
scnd_lang.Engilsh354: When full, you can pull off a rage/fury combo.
scnd_lang.Engilsh361: You trigger Fury/Rage by pressing 'L' or clicking on the Flashing Fury Icon.
scnd_lang.Engilsh362: Note, only one player can activate Fury at a time.
scnd_lang.Engilsh363: If your opponent triggers it first, you are in TROUBLE.
scnd_lang.Engilsh375: He blew a hole into the ground... hes escaping
scnd_lang.Engilsh376: No, hes heading for the Hidden Chamber
scnd_lang.Engilsh379: Crap, lets get out of here!
scnd_lang.Engilsh381: We cant contain the Saints any longer
scnd_lang.Engilsh383: There it is, I finally found the Crest
scnd_lang.Engilsh386: Did you think we would leave the Crest of Hope unprotected?
scnd_lang.Engilsh387: Ive seriously had enough of you for one day
scnd_lang.Engilsh389: Its, some kind of a guardian!
scnd_lang.Engilsh390: Ive come too far, I wont lose now.....
scnd_lang.Engilsh392: Uh, now would be a good time to stand back
scnd_lang.Engilsh406: Took you five minutes to win

scnd_lang.Engilsh410: You only used Physical moves to defeat your opponent
scnd_lang.Engilsh411: You only used Celestia to defeat your opponent
scnd_lang.Engilsh412: You're getting the hang of this
scnd_lang.Engilsh415: You are a master of this game
